summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Royal Koltuk Yıkama appointment management system. Backend APIs working at 93.1% success rate, frontend fully functional with all core features operational.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 405 Method Not Allowed instead of 404 Not Found for GET request to non-existent transaction

cleanup_issues.issue: Service deletion during cleanup returned 404 - possible timing issue or service already deleted

passed_tests: Backend: All service CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Backend: All appointment management features (create, update status, search, filtering)
Backend: Transaction/cash register functionality with date filtering
Backend: Dashboard statistics API (today_appointments, today_completed, today_income, week_income, month_income)
Backend: Settings management (get/update working hours and appointment intervals)
Backend: Customer history tracking by phone number
Backend: Default services auto-loading (12 services found, exceeding expected 6)
Frontend: Main page loading and dashboard display
Frontend: All navigation menu items (Randevular, Hizmetler, Kasa, Ayarlar)
Frontend: Dashboard stats cards display (Bugünkü Randevular, Tamamlanan, Bugünkü Gelir)
Frontend: New appointment form with all required fields
Frontend: Service management page with 12 service cards
Frontend: Cash register with income filtering (Bugün, Bu Hafta, Bu Ay)
Frontend: Settings page with working hours configuration
Frontend: Mobile responsive design with working mobile menu
